title: Contact the Student Loans Company
overview: Contact details for the Student Loans Company – including repayment and refund enquiries.
body:
Contact the Student Loans Company if you need help with things like:

+ repaying your loan
+ getting a refund
+ making a complaint about your loan repayment

^This page is also available [in Welsh (Cymraeg)](/cysylltu-ar-cwmni-benthyciadau-myfyrwyr).

You can contact them in English or Welsh.

^If you want to speak to an adviser about someone else’s account, you’ll need to [get their consent before contacting the Student Loans Company](/guidance/allowing-someone-else-to-manage-your-student-loan-account).

If you’re still studying and need help with your student finance, you should contact:

+ [Student Finance England](/contact-student-finance-england)
+ [Student Awards Agency Scotland](https://www.saas.gov.uk/contact-us)
+ [Student Finance Wales](https://www.studentfinancewales.co.uk/contact/)
+ [Student Finance Northern Ireland](https://www.studentfinanceni.co.uk/contact/general-enquiries/)

nodes.body: ^You cannot get a refund of any [voluntary repayments](/repaying-your-student-loan/make-extra-repayments) you've made.

options.label: Your income was below the repayment threshold
You’ve repaid more than you owe

You're on the wrong repayment plan

nodes.title: If you have a question about something else
nodes.body:
You can sign in to [your online account](/sign-in-to-manage-your-student-loan-balance) to:

+ check your balance
+ check how much interest you're paying
+ ask for a refund if you made repayments but your income was below the repayment threshold
+ make an extra repayment
+ set up and amend Direct Debits
+ check which repayment plan you’re on
+ update your contact details
+ print proof of your repayment plan if your employer needs it

##Other ways to get help

If you have a customer reference number, have it with you when you call or include it on your letter.

Read the [guidance on how to make a complaint](/government/organisations/student-loans-company/about/complaints-procedure).

nodes.title: Getting a refund if your income was below the repayment threshold
nodes.body:
Before you request a refund, check the [repayment threshold for your loan](/repaying-your-student-loan/what-you-pay).

You can request a refund in [your online account](/sign-in-to-manage-your-student-loan-balance). Check your bank details are correct in your online account before you request a refund.

nodes.title: Getting information in Braille or large print
nodes.body:
If you need any letters, forms or guides in Braille or large print, email the Student Loans Company with:

+ your address
+ your customer reference number, if you have one
+ what you need changing into Braille or large print
+ for large print, the font size and the font type you need

$C
[brailleandlargefonts@slc.co.uk](mailto:brailleandlargefonts@slc.co.uk)
$C

Annoyingly the opening times for Wales are slightly different, so I’ve added these in brackets. I thought this was better than repeating the list of dates twice, which I thought would be more confusing for users and mean they would be more likely to misread the relevant opening times.
